S.3. The information materials on
educational, career, personal and
social concerns are readily available,
such as:
S.3.3. Guidelines on drug abuse
prevention and control;
THE INFORMATION MATERIALS ON EDUCATION, CAREER, PERSONAL AND SOCIAL CONCERNS ARE DISPLAYED IN DIFFERENT AREAS IN THE CAMPUS SUCH AS IN THE READING ROOM, CLINIC AND FACULTY ROOM.
